alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:54AM CST until February 16 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONROE...EASTERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN STE. GENEVIEVE COUNTIES... At 253 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Olympian Village, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Festus, Pevely, Crystal City, Herculaneum, Horine, Barnhart, Valmeyer, Fountain, Imperial, Waterloo and Oakville. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site and Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 187. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
